description:
(i)	Outline application comprising units for 9000sqm of B2 & B8 uses with new vehicular access from Evans Road and Speke Boulevard and widened service access road to south;
(ii)	Full application to erect 1 no. A1 retail unit (2413sqm), 1 no. A1 retail unit (2560sqm) and 1 no. restaurant/leisure A3/D2 unit (172sqm) following demolition of Booth House; reconfigure access from western side of Evans Road and Speke Boulevard/Pharmacy Road, create service access from northern side of Evans Road, and layout associated car parking and landscaping.  (Revised site access arrangements received: January 2017)
site_address: Former Rayware Site, Speke Boulevard, Liverpool, L24 9HZ
